trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sonoma
There was one other sighting in Sonoma on or around February 6th 2011
divs: sighting detailsdont know if this is related (or not) to my sighting last night-but thought i should report it. since i saw the "pop" or burst of light from the supposed star last night --- today i have been having nose bleeds all day & have terrible buzzing that changes to high pitched ringing in my ears-driving me crazy!i never have nose bleeds-it's been @ least 10-15 years since i have had one. i have had ringing in the ears after a cold in the past-yet i have not had a cold\flu for 6 months or so...please post if anyone else has these issues!very strange! would love to hear from others...to put my mind at ease.
Summary: Health issues related to the sighting(?)
